- The claim specifies a 24th pick in the 9th round, which corresponds to the row index 8 since rows are 1-indexed. However, the 8th row contains a different player with an overall pick number of 220.

Therefore, the player "glenn capriola" was not selected with the 24th pick in the 9th round, so the claim is FALSE.
